description: I am a regular commuter to the North Station area. status_notes: Case Resolved. Dear Constituent,. National Grid responding to a gas leak on your street activated an emergency permit on Friday 12/22/17. Emergency work must be performed no matter what time of day or night in the interest of public safety and the protection of private property. They took care of the emergency but had to then shore the hole and make final repairs . We called National Grid and asked why they worked last night.. they stated the hole started filling with water and they thought it was do to a water leak but determined it was ground water instead. All remaining work will be done during the day. The city apologizes for the inconvenience this necessary work caused. For any questions or concerns, please contact the number listed below. Sincerely,. Mark Cardarelli. Supervisor of Utility Coordination and Compliance. Boston Public Works Department. 617-635-4951 Office.
